body_html:
I run into the same issue when using V100 to do tensorflow benchmark in a tensorflow1.8 container with cuda9 and cudnn7. Test on host also needs much more warm ups more than P100, but the most in container. I also asked this question on nvidia dev forum here.
https://devtalk.nvidia.com/default/topic/1036474/container-tensorflow/slower-performance-in-container-when-using-v100/

body:
I run into the same issue when using V100 to do tensorflow benchmark in a tensorflow1.8 container with cuda9 and cudnn7. Test on host also needs much more warm ups more than P100, but the most in container. I also asked this question on nvidia dev forum here.
https://devtalk.nvidia.com/default/topic/1036474/container-tensorflow/slower-performance-in-container-when-using-v100/
